contentBody.headMarkup:
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
<title>Shreyas Barve Portfolio</title>

<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/salesforce-lightning-design-system.min.css?{ versionKey }" />

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }" />



<!-- branding stylesheets-->

<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ styles/styles.css }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ styles/print.css }" media="print"/>

<!-- custom styling -->
<style>
    .interactions-component.lwc-6jb05p8ont5 {
        min-height: 0px !important;
    }
    
    .section-content.community_layout-section_section{
        padding:0px !important;
    }
    
    .currency-app .slds-dropdown_fluid {
        min-width: 120px !important;
    }
    
    c-portfolio-user-details lightning-output-field span.slds-form-element__label {
        font-size: 18px;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: #fff;
    }
    
    c-portfolio-user-details lightning-output-field a, c-portfolio-user-details lightning-output-field .slds-form-element__static {
        font-size: 18px;
        color: #f6c403;
    }
    
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper ul.slds-tabs_scoped__nav {
        background: #f6c403;
    }
    
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper ul.slds-tabs_scoped__nav li.slds-is-active {
        background: #fff;
    }
    
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper button.slds-accordion__summary-action, 
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper button.slds-accordion__summary-action:active, 
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper button.slds-accordion__summary-action:hover, 
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper button.slds-accordion__summary-action:visited, 
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper button.slds-accordion__summary-action:focus {
        background: #f6c403;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 20px;
        color: #000;
        padding: 8px 16px;
        margin: 8px 8px 0px 8px;
    }
    
    c-portfolio-tabs-wrapper .slds-accordion__section {
        padding: 0px !important;
    }
</style>
